text: "Resurrection" is a song by Canadian alternative rock group Moist. It was released in December 1996 as the second single from their second studio album, Creature. It is the band's second highest charted single ever in Canada, reaching number 8 on Canada's RPM Singles Chart and also reached number 4 on the Alternative chart. ==Reception== Billboard reviewed the song favourably, calling it "a killer slice of pop-injected angst". They went on to say that it is "as lyrically intelligent as it is sonically striking".Billboard - June 28, 1997, page 75 Google Books ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- bgcolor="#ebf5ff" !Chart (1996) !Peak position |- |Canada Top Singles (RPM) | align="center"|8 |- |Canada Alternative 30 (RPM) |align="center"|4 |} ==References== ==External links== * *Lyrics of this song - Resurrection Category:1996 singles Category:Moist (Canadian band) songs Category:1996 songs Category:EMI Records singles
title: Resurrection (Moist song)
